Product: Squeaky Clarifying Cleanser, 8 oz
Title: Great product, but a bit of a warning
Review: I really liked this product! It was great for my hair and I noticed that it would feel less oily even the day after using it. I normally wash daily and have oily, thin hair (type 2b-c). I am hesitant to order it again because I ordered the larger bottle version through the Uncle Funky‚Äôs website, and I found that it was entirely a different formula than what this smaller bottle had, and left my hair a tangled mess before I conditioned it massively. Since I don‚Äôt know if Uncle Funky‚Äôs has just changed the formula for the shampoo entirely, or if I happened to get a bad batch (and their website didn‚Äôt have contact information), I‚Äôm giving it 4 stars and a bit of a warning. I would love to use the first version of the product again, though. Absolutely the best shampoo I‚Äôve ever used.

Product: Squeaky Clarifying Cleanser, 8 oz
Title: I love this shampoo!!
Review: I will forever use this kind of shampoo til I find something better. (hard to do) I love the way it smells while I shower and how it leaves my bathroom smelling so good too! it for sure makes my scalp tingle if I leave it in for about 5 minutes which I looooove cause 1. it feels really good and 2. it really cleans the oils and sweat from my hair!! It also leaves my hair suuuuuper SOFT and gets my curls POPPIN!

Product: Rich & Funky Moisturizing Shampoo
Title: LIES ABOUT INGREDIENTS! CURLY GIRLS STAY AWAY!
Review: I am so disappointed in Uncle Funkys products. I wanted to like their products but just can‚Äôt considering they straight up lie to your face about the ingredients. If you have curly hair like me, LOOK AT THEIR LABELS FIRST!Even though it says they are paraben, sulfate, and silicone free, they are not. They are LIARS! This product in particular has Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate AND Sodium C14-26 Olefin Sulfonate.I‚Äôve even found that their Richee Rich Hudrating Conditioner has Behentrimonium Metho Sulfate and AMODIMTHICONE!!! THAT IS NOT SILICONE FREE!!! How is a supposed ‚ÄúHydrating Conditioner‚Äù supposed to hydrate curly hair when you have a silicone blocking moisture?So incredibly disappointed and disgusted. Never buying again.

Product: Rich & Funky Moisturizing Shampoo
Title: Love the product hate the price!
Review: I love their products. What I don‚Äôt love is how they‚Äôve jacked up the prices during this Coronavirus crisis. Their moisturizer conditioner is the best. However, I will be looking for another product because it‚Äôs way too expensive.

Product: Rich & Funky Moisturizing Shampoo
Title: Mediocre at best.
Review: I brought this because my hairstylist used it, and my hair turned out great.But that‚Äôs usually the case. Your hairstylist uses a product, and you use the same thing and get completely different results.I can‚Äôt say I‚Äôm a fan. The shampoo is a bit expensive, and I don‚Äôt see a noticeable difference. I began using it on my daughters hair. She has soft curly hair. I honestly believe whatever curly shampoo I use will do.So, I say all of this to say .... I don‚Äôt know if it is worth the money. But try it out and see. I tried the travel packet first, and was impressed. (It didn‚Äôt have the shampoo in it. Just the conditioning styling cream and styling cream. If it did I wouldn‚Äôt have brought the large bottle.)

Product: Rich & Funky Moisturizing Shampoo

Product: Bye-Bye Buildup
Title: Great product, TERRIBLE packing design
Review: I have mostly 2C curls that go into large ringlets, that are SUPER dry and frizzy, and this product is AMAZING. It took out product buildup from my hair without being overly drying, and left my hair with enough slip to detangle and style outside of the shower without any issues. It actually felt BETTER the longer I let it sit I'm my hair while showing. This was an EXCELLENT cowash that really helps balance even my insanely dry hair.That being said.. The pump on this product has some weird design flaw with sealing that won't allow it to work. I have to just take the top off the pump and dump the product onto my hands to use it, because the seal on the top apparently broke or was never working in the first place. It's not the end of the world, I can obviously still get to the product, and I'm annoyed that I have to give a lower rating because of a mechanism fault, but.. Here we are.If you order this, know the product itself is great, but the bottle and pump design may suck and not work.

Product: Bye-Bye Buildup
Title: Will Take Build-Up Out of Hair
Review: It WILL get rid of all the junk you've put in your hair. Just be sure to ADD the moisture back it or it will be VERY DRYING.

Product: Bye-Bye Buildup
Title: I really like this conditioner.
Review: Love this stuff! Not a fan of the shampoo, but they really helps my daughter and I curls. I have 4C hair and she has 3C.

Product: Bye-Bye Buildup
Title: UFD on a Roll with New Products
Review: This cleansing conditioner is very cleansing. One wouldn't think it with all of the oils, but the formulation is very cleansing, but moisturizing. I have a very sensitive scalp, and this works great to remove any build-up I may have accumulated over a few days! I've been using a well-known brand, but have been trying to find a no-poo cleanser that isn't drying and protein-free. I will repurchase this, and hope that they make it in a larger size. My favorite UFD products: Bye Bye Build-Up, Curly Magic (gel), and Heal & Renew moisture masque. These are so good!

Product: Bye-Bye Buildup
Title: Excellent for curly swimmers
Review: This product works exceptionally well for my 4a gray natural coily curls.  It has been a staple used after swimming.  It‚Äôs very thick and moisturizes the hair well while removing product buildup.

Product: Bye-Bye Buildup
Title: Great co-wash
Review: Love the way it gently cleanses without stripping my hair. It‚Äôs my go to produce on wash days.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: It definitely works!
Review: I wear weaves and wigs and work out a lot and start smelling my hair even when other people don't ( or are too polite to say). This is a great product to use between washes. I gave the scent 3 stars because I'm a woman who's very into scents. However, the scent is such that both males and females can use it. It's kinda gender neutral. I used this product the first night I got it and right away my hair/scalp smelled better. But at first, it mainly smelled like the product. By the next morning, however, even the product smell was gone and my hair had no bad smells at all. This was after going to the gym all week and sweating a lot.  It really is a great product but I would say, especially to the fellas ( you know how you can be sometimesüôÇ) that this is NOT a substitute for washing your hair. You should still wash your hair on a regular basis; your scalp needs it. But does what it promises and will take unpleasant smells out of your hair.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Best product for what it‚Äôs meant for
Review: Wish they had a masculine smell for men with locs but this definitely does the job between retwist on starter locs. There‚Äôs absolutely no sweaty scalp smell at all, and I work in a warehouse with 100 degree plus temperatures......definitely worth buying, I don‚Äôt know why there‚Äôs bad reviews for this on her honestly

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Love!! Great alternative to dry shampoo!!
Review: I was a die hard fan of dry shampoo for years UNTIL I started having tons of problems with dryness and irritation. It took me a long time to realize but the dry shampoo had been worsening my dry scalp.I took a long break from dry shampoo and would try and use it now and again but kept finding it would irritate my skin every time I'd use it. I still wanted to find an alternative for days I didn't have time to wash my hair and didn't want to be self conscious about odor.I saw some of the reviews on this product and was worried the smell would be too strong as I have a sensitive sense of smell and easily get nauseated. I tried this anyway and I'm so happy I did! The scent doesn't smell artificial at all, it smells like a nice light fruity/clean essential oil smell. Nothing juvenile, just nice and light. And let me tell you it really WORKS! It gets rid of any odors and just leaves a light fragrance instead. It doesn't smell like oily hair and perfume. It neutralizes odors very well!It is an oil so it won't soak up anything but I don't mind this very much, I use this when I probably have another day or two before washing and plan on wearing sleeker styles anyway. Its not too heavy and doesn't weigh down my hair. I have thick coarse hair and it works very well for me.I recommend this to my friends and family. Will definitely be repurchasing!:)

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Cheap fragrance
Review: I've only used this product once but can agree with other reviewers on the fact that it can get rid of that particular sweaty/musty odor on an oily scalp (like mine) a couple of days after washing.  My only gripe is its fragrance hence my two-star deduction. It smells like a cheap flowery body mist straight out of the dollar store.  I wish they would've formulated it with a more subtle natural fragrance.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Love this stuff
Review: Amazing product. It gets rid of excess oil as well as odors or smoke, pollutants and dirty hair.  It does all this but doesn‚Äôt dry out the ends of your hair. Keep this around for times you need to freshen your hair but can‚Äôt wash it.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Definitely Defunkafied. Love it so far
Review: This stuff is bomb. Seriously, I workout abut 5-6 times a week and my hair is always in a protective style. Though I wash my scalp while my hair is in braids. The sweat brings oder in my hair during the week. I just got this yesterday and I used it that same day and today. It is awesome. It brought moisture to my hair and boom, oder is gone. I don't smell anything at all. Awesome product.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Not a Sophisticated Scent
Review: The smell!  Ugh.  The smell.  I could not abide by the fake-y juvenile candy-ness.  I was looking for something that I could spray on after hot yoga that would get me through till my shampoo.  As someone who wears expensive perfume, I couldn't take this smell on me.  I attempted to add some essential oil drops to the concoction to make it smell more grown-up, but no dice, that didn't work.  I ended up pouring it down the drain and recycling the bottle within a week of purchase.  I highly suggest you find a way to preview this scent in a store first, otherwise you may be stuck with it.  Also, please note that it contains castor oil.  I was looking for a neutral deodorizer, not more oily grease in my hair.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Works but not best smell
Review: I bought this because my hair naturally stinks. It doesn‚Äôt hold any scent from shampoos or conditioners. It just always smells like hair and after a couple days that switches to an even more not so pleasant smell. My mom and aunt always complains my hair stinks so I bought this. Definitely takes away the hair smell but it could smell better. Smells like flowery air freshener. Does work though.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Why am I just knowing about this product!
Review: I am an African American female with relaxed hair. I'm also a person that has always worked out and have always been a big sweater. I've inquired with various people about how to deal with my hair odor..I've been told to spray perfume on my hair -didn't work, I've been told to get a fragrance moisture didn't work. However, I have only used this products twice since I purchased it and it's a miracle worker. I spray it on my hair after my workout and TA-DAH:)

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Great for refreshing scalp. Smells nice
Review: Works great for refreshing the scalp between washes. I prefer it to dry shampoo because it's moisturizing, so I can spray it all over my hair if I want to, and it doesn't leave any noticeable residue or buildup. The scent is decently strong, but not overpowering. It could be an issue if you're sensitive to scents. I think it smells nice, and it really does seem to remove odors from the hair/scalp instead of just covering them up.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: No thank you
Review: I don't wear a protective style. I also have relaxed hair. So I thought I'd give this a try to extend till my next shampoo. This product thickened my roots and left a build up.  It didn't help with dandruff either. However, it did take the odor away and soothe itching momentarily. Not worth the $15 I paid for it in my opinion. I returned it.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Stay away. Not at all what is promised!
Review: I read so many good reviews, so I bought this product. It is a big waste of money. The smell is strong and not very pleasant. Plus it does not do anything. It doesnt soothe the scalp and I dont feel refreshed.  It just makes the scalp more greasy by the end of the day. I feel highly cheated.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: No more smoky hair!
Review: Works so much better than expected.  I smoke, and I hate my hair smelling like I've been through a fire.  I love this stuff! No more smoky hair smell.  I can just spray as much as I need and I'm good to good.  Use it any time I smoke so my hair smells clean all day.  Love it love it love it.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Smells terrific!!
Review: I am so glad that I found this product. I love to support black businesses. I will definitely be looking into more of these products. I only spray my braids every 4-5 days. The scent last that long and even longer. Soft scent but definitely can smell it! Love love love!

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Product sort of changed
Review: June 2021 review: Longtime fan of this product. I had not been able to find this particular freshener for quite some time in the stores. Even on here, it was not even a Prime eligible item for a good bit. I really wanted the spray because I've been back in the gym really hard lately and like to stay fresh from head to toe. I searched and found it back as a Prime item. I was excited until I started using it. It's not giving the same freshness as before. It takes a lot more product to notice a difference. Is my hair or scalp smelly...no. But the product seems different. Not as vibrant and pleasing in it's aroma. Leaving 4 stars because I think I received a compromised bottle. I trusted in this brand and don't believe the brand is falling off. Just got a bad batch.Original review: I work out 6 days a week. Keeps my hair pleasantly fresh in between washes. The packaging was neat and the item is worth its value. It does what it says.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Great hair pick me up!
Review: I use this after my workouts daily with my extensions. It works extremely well and has a nice scent that isn‚Äôt overbearing. I‚Äôve seen reviews where people don‚Äôt like the smell, but honestly it doesn‚Äôt smell bad at all, now if you used an extreme amount then yes, you would sting the nostrils. It‚Äôs a wet spray that goes on easy. You don‚Äôt have to use very much to get the results you want. It didn‚Äôt cause my hair to look greasy or flat after using, it just made it smell fresh after a long workout. I recommend this if you are looking for a quick hair pick me up from working out or just being outside and being sweaty.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Good Product
Review: When I sprayed the product into the air I did not like the smell, but when I sprayed it on my hair it was completely different.I have long hair that picks up whatever order is around. This will keep me from needing to wash it every day.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Love it! Will definitely buy again and recommend.
Review: I was looking for something to get the smell of smoke out of my braids because my friend and I went to a party where there was smoke. I am so happy that I found this product! It smells amazing and work like a charm. I will definitely buy again and recommend. Thank you

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Amazing, look no further!!!
Review: I don't typically write reviews unless something really blows my socks off! This product does exactly what it says it does. It makes your hair smell amazing, even better than recently washed hair. I like the way my hair smells after spraying this stuff on it, that I not only use it after working out, I now use it all the time. Yes, even when my hair is still damp after being freshly washed. I just really love the way it smells!

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Great for those humid days!
Review: I wear my hair in a natural hairstyle and I can honestly say that this stuff really works, especially when its humid!  I love the nice soft fragrance its not too strong and it doesn't conflict with wearing perfume. .  I really wish you would make a travel size.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Best hair refresher I've ever used.
Review: Smells so good and is not overbearing at all. I've tried alot on my locs and this is the best I've found in five years!

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Scent is off a bit...
Review: As much as I love this product, the bottles I got seemed old. The scent is off a bit from when I've purchased in a store.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Exactly what I was looking for
Review: I have crochet braids and work out 4-5 days a week. I can't always rinse or blow dry my hair after a workout and was getting a mildew smell. I tried astringent, which took away the smell, but dried my hair out, so this product is perfect. I've been using it a little over a month now after workouts, and no mildew smell, no dry, brittle hair, and I like the scent. Love it so far.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Scent is NOT overpowering
Review: Seems like the scent will be overpowering but it's not after it dries. Just smells clean. It doesn't burn an itchy scalp at all & feels very refreshing. Would definitely buy again instead of spending $30 on other brands.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Loveeee it
Review: This spray does exactly what it‚Äôs described to do. It refreshes your locs and makes ramen smell amazing. The scent is floral but not over powering it‚Äôs very pleasant and I get compliments on my hair smelling very nice when I give hugs. I would highly recommend. For us sisterloc sisters the nozzle is the right misting that we need so it doesn‚Äôt overly saturate our hair

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: I like it
Review: I have a mild case of seborrheic dermatitis and get a smelly scalp in between washes sometimes.  I section,  spray liberally on my scalp and massage in.  It really helps to moisturizer and absorb odors on the scalp.  Way better than a dry shampoo.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Great product & price!!
Review: I have tried quite a few diffrent sprays for sweaty hair and This is by far the BEST!!! The smell is amazing!!  I have straight thick hair, and sweat wayy more than any woman should, this kills the smell, and makes my hair feel light and fresh, and again, I LOVE the fragrance!!  Wonderful product&purchase!! I'm soo glad I bought it bc I was initially hesitant not having the hair type it says it's good for.  Great value!! And I love knowing my purchase helps support better living conditions for woman!!

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz

My bad for not checking the ingredient more carefully.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Fantastic product, multi use
Review: This is one of the best beauty products I've ever used. I used this the first time when I had faux locs installed. The locs stayed in for 3 weeks, and this was the only product I used on my hair. My hair stayed moisturized and smelled fresh the whole time. I now use this between shampoos. Even after a workout my hair smells like the sweet floral scent of this product and stays fresh all day.I've recently had the MiraDry procedure done. I hardly sweat, but I still have a small amount of odor from time to time.  I no longer need traditional deodorant everyday, but I need a natural deodorant for those times when some protection is needed. I thought since this works so well with my hair I'd try it as a natural deodorant. Surprisingly it works very well. I tested it on a hot sunny day while running errands. When I came home I expected I'd have a bit of odor, but I didn't!I love a product that works well, but this goes above and beyond. I couldn't be happier with the purchase.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Works well
Review: I needed something to refresh my scalp after workouts but didn't want dry shampoo, I hate that cloud of "powder" it leaves after spraying and the fact that you really have to work to brush out the residue that dry shampoo leaves behind. I stumbled on this and like it so far. I can see how some don't care for the smell and while I can't say the smell is fantastic it's just okay.Ultimately, it delivers on the thing I need most- refreshing my scalp after a workout.

Product: Defunk Hair Odor Neutralizing Tonic, 8 oz
Title: Light Moisture
Review: I pretty much use this daily for my locs.  It provides light moisturizing. Light enough to use daily without buildup.  Smells light and fresh.  I use less for a refresher and more to get me through to my next shampoo day.  Love this stuff!

Product: Squeaky 32oz
Title: Squeaky Clean Hair
Review: Aa someone who loves to use product and braids, this shampoo gets ALL of it out, leaves your scalp tingling, smelling fresh and your hair moisturized. One of the best shampoos for natural hair. If Shea Moisture or Cantu don't worl for you, try this!
